Changes compared previous versions
**********************************

The first released NeuroDevSim version was 0.8.8. Version 0.9.2 was the first release of the new user interface based on ``manage_front`` and Exceptions, and used new processor scheduling methods. First public version is 1.0.0, which is used as reference to track changes.

NeuroDevSim concepts are derived from the `NeuroMaC software <https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnana.2014.00092/full>`_ originally developed by Benjamin Torben-Nielsen and extended by Erik De Schutter to version 0.6.2.
